newsitem.title: POLAND: Poland's Handlowy pricing range due late Friday.
newsitem.headline: Poland's Handlowy pricing range due late Friday.

text.p: The Polish Treasury Ministry is due to announce on Friday a price range for Bank Handlowy public offering but the decision may come late in the evening, a source close to the offering said.

"According to the issue prospectus the price range will be set today before midnight. I hope that it will happen a bit earlier," said Marcin Wojcieszek, of Handlowy's brokerage, which manages the bank's domestic offering.
The state treasury is offering individual and institutional investors up to 45 percent of Handlowy in a public subscription starting on May 26.

Handlowy employees will be offered about 7.1 percent of the bank's shares at their nominal value of four zlotys and the price of a 42.9 percent tranche for selected financial institutions will be set in separate negotiations.
